metadata.dc:author: Lacoste Marín, J A
García Martín, F J
Martínez León, M
Martínez Valverde, A
metadata.dc:description: This study realizes a view of the patient, his disease and his environment, divided in newborn, kindergarten and schoolers, and into other group, adolescents. The themes are neurology clinic, familiar, social and economic environment, problems of the chronic disease, scholarships, hospitalization ahd assistance, adoption and legal rules in relation with the pediatrics patients with AIDS or positives antibodies.
metadata.dc:title: Marginación y Sida en pediatría.
[Marginalization and AIDS in pediatrics].
